creator: info@fdsoft.it
text:
hi
I have installed on debian by apt-get.
when i create a new file .htpasswd -c the new file is corrupted
this is the output of file  whith
user fabio pw fabio
user fabio1 pw fabio
user fabio2 pw fabio
----------------------


fabio:ZAfOgvnjE/vpwPw??1z
fabio1:rxMZDgVIrGm7Y w??1z
fabio2:rFMmzxO/Xum42 w??1z

if I update the user password the file is correct 

Tnk
Fabio DOnnarumma

This looks like a debian specific bug. (I can reproduce using current debian
unstable, but not with the 1.3.29 release from apache) .
Please file an issue at bugs.debian.org on the apache-utils package.
creator: thom@planetarytramp.net
